title: Expecting empty properties to be returned as null values when creating a SESSION RESULT
gherkin:
When the user creates a "SESSION RESULT" "1st place" with the following data
  | key | value | datatype |
  | position | 1 | number |
  | driver_name | Lewis Hamilton | string |
Then the response should contain the following properties
  | key | value | datatype |
  | position | 1 | number |
  | race_number |  | string |
  | driver_name | Lewis Hamilton | string |
  | team_name |  | string |
  | race_time |  | string |
  | laps |  | number |
  | status |  | string |
  | points |  | number |
